DOC.brief_summary: This observational (non-interventional) post-authorization safety study (PASS) will investigate the application of Venofundin 6% and of Tetraspan 6% in children with special regard to drug safety.
DOC.brief_title: Non-Interventional (Observational) Post-Authorization Safety Study of HES 130/0.42 in Paediatric Patients
DOC.criteria: Age â‰¤12 years Risk of anaesthesia: American Society of Anaesthesiologists (ASA) risk score: I III infusion of Venofundin 6% or of Tetraspan 6% elective intervention contraindications according to SmPC
